author: Andrew Udvare <audvare@gmail.com>
description: Chrome extension to open a URL with mpv.
name: open-in-mpv

scripts.check-formatting: prettier -c './**/*.cfg' './**/*.ini' './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.yml' ./.prettierrc ./.style.yapf && poetry run isort . --check && poetry run yapf -rd open_in_mpv .stubs test
scripts.format: prettier -w './**/*.cfg' './**/*.ini' './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.yml' ./.prettierrc ./.style.yapf && poetry run isort . && poetry run yapf -ri open_in_mpv .stubs test
scripts.qa: eslint --report-unused-disable-directives src && yarn mypy && yarn pylint && yarn check-spelling && yarn check-formatting
